import React from "react"; import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import "./index.css"; import { useDetailAPI, useStateAPI } from "../api"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Index() { let { slug } = useParams() const detailResult = useDetailAPI(`https://www.instagram.com/p/${slug}/?__a=1&max_id=endcursor`) const profileResult = useStateAPI('https://www.instagram.com/lacorgi/?__a=1&max_id=endcursor') console.log(detailResult); console.log(profileResult.posts); function convert(value) { if(value>=1000000) { value=(value/1000000)+"M" } else if(value>=1000) { value=Math.trunc((value/1000))+"K"; } return value; } return ( <>
{detailResult.username} . follow

{item.node.owner.username} . {item.node.text}
)) }

)) }
); } export default Index;
